entity.name: [EC Test] Trump ends press briefing early after question on COVID-19 testing

text: @Yamiche @PressSec You promised not lie but now you have in this press conference! Trump had three years to build the stockpile yet did not! He has no excuse for his ineffective response to Covid19! He didn’t even declare a national emergency until mid March. He was warned by staff but did nothing!
